title: bia.network
author: bia.network
content: About Alchemy PayFounded in Singapore in 2017, Alchemy Pay is a payment gateway that seamlessly connects crypto with traditional fiat currencies for businesses, developers, and end users. With its On & Off Ramp solution, NFT Checkout, Crypto Card and Crypto Payments, Alchemy Pay supports payments in 173 countries. The Ramp is a one-stop solution to buy and sell crypto and fiat, easily integrated by platforms and dApps according to requirements. The NFT Checkout enables direct purchases of NFTs using fiat payment methods. The Crypto Card solution empowers businesses and token issuers to provide users with branded virtual and physical cards for instant global spending.ACH is the Alchemy Pay network token on Ethereum and BNB Smart Chain.General RulesA. The entire campaign is planned to unfold over a span of two months, beginning on August 25, and is meticulously structured into two distinct stages. Each stage lasts about one month.B. Rewards will be distributed to participants within one month following the conclusion of the campaign. It is essential that all your work remains intact during this period. Please ensure all submissions and contributions are preserved to guarantee eligibility for the rewards.C. Multi-accounts, bots, spamming, and so on are strictly prohibited, and you will be immediately disqualified without notification. Only original content will be accepted; copying from the project website, YouTube channels, or others' work will be rejected.D. By joining this program, you accept that the project's team can use your creation as marketing materials. Our Bounty manager and project team reserve the right to change the terms of the bounty campaign.E. All content must be in Turkish! Only Turkish is accepted.F. All participants must follow Alchemy Pay Twitter, Discord, Telegram, Community Twitter.G. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.H. Please join Telegram group if you have anything unclear https://t.me/+oyNhp72PkuoxM2Y1Proof of Authentication Format:Quote#Proof of AuthenticationForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Discord Username:Twitter Username:Telegram Username:EVM Address:Rewards DistributionTotal Rewards: $2,000 in $ACHStage 1       [40%] – $800 in $ACH Stage 2           [50%] – $1000 in $ACHExtra Bonus     [10%] – $200 in $ACHCampaign Stage 1 (Aug 25 – Sept 30)Establish robust collaborations with a diverse range of influencers and communities, fostering a collective effort to amplify the reach of Alchemy Pay. Our aim is to facilitate a comprehensive promotion of our brand, enabling Turkish users to gain a profound understanding of our innovative project and cutting-edge products. We encourage more UGC and educational content about Alchemy Pay based on the information we provided at the end of this blog and shown in the public media.RulesA. Retweet and Quote at least 2 tweets a day – 1 stake (Max 1 stake a day)B. Generate blogs and share on Twitter – starting 4 stakes (Max 20 stakes a week)a. Write a Medium blog over 200 words and share it on Twitter by making a tweet.b. Please tag @AlchemyPay and hashtag #ACH #AlchemyPayTurkish.c. It would be the introduction of Alchemy Pay and everything about the brand would be good.d. Focus on the brand and recent campaigns or news.e. Dedicated work will be granted with more stakes.C. Creation of memes and emojis – starting from 2 stakes (Max 10 stakes a week)a. A set of 4 items will be granted with stakes.b. Must contain the Alchemy Pay logo or related elements.c. Share the creations by making a tweet or in the Discord/TG community.d. Sex, illegal, and racism etc. are not allowed.e. Alchemy Pay reserves the right to decide whether it is qualified or not. Dedicated work will be granted with more stakes.D. Change your Twitter Profile Nickname with 〡 Alchemy Pay for 1 month – 3 stakesa. Make sure you retain the name. Will be disqualified once changed in the middle once spotted.E. Other creative and interesting forms of content is also welcome – Various stakes, depending on the quality (Max 30 stakes a week)[Notice]1. Make sure you submit your proof via the form. The ownership belongs to the first submitter.Join here: https://forms.gle/BfoMKoF4VqQd2n2g82. There will be extra incentive stakes to key opinion leaders with over 300 followers (The upper limit will increase accordingly):300 to 1999 followers: +10% 2000 to 4999 followers: +20%5000 to 8999 followers: +30%9000 to 11999 followers: +40%Over 12,000 followers: +50%3. Situations that can get extra Bonus:- Impression over 1,000- Comments + RTs/QTs + Likes over 5004. Only those who get over 20 stakes are qualified to share the $800 in $ACH according to the weights of the stakes.5. The campaign can only take place if there are over 50 participants.Proof of Authentication Format:Quote#Proof of AuthenticationForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Discord Username:Twitter Username:Telegram Username:EVM Address:Campaign Stage 2 (Oct 1 – Oct 28)Alchemy Pay has now expanded its services to include the ability to purchase cryptocurrencies using the Turkish Lira (TRY) through domestic bank transfers. This new feature not only enhances the platform's usability but also signifies a strategic move in making the acquisition of digital currencies more straightforward for users in Turkey. Our purpose in announcing this feature is to encourage more users to explore and take advantage of this streamlined method, solidifying Alchemy Pay's commitment to providing innovative and accessible solutions in the crypto landscape. Rewards distributionTotal: 50% – $1000 in $ACHConsist of:Blog               [20%] – $400 in $ACH Demo Video    [10%] – $200 in $ACHCommunity     [20%] – $400 in $ACHBlog: $400 in $ACH1. Participants must subscribe to Alchemy Pay YouTube and Medium Channel.2. Generate deep-insight blogs and share on Twitter.3. Fully read through the demonstration of Alchemy Pay’s products.4. To distinguish from Stage 1, the content must focus on the products, On & Off Ramp solution, NFT Checkout, Crypto Card and Crypto Payments.5. Write a Medium blog over 500 words and share it on Twitter by making a tweet (Tag @AlchemyPay and hashtag #ACH #AlchemyPayTurkish #Ramp).6. Sharing the blog to the Alchemy Pay communities. 7. The criteria will be considered: Relevance, Originality, Depth of Analysis and Accuracy.Rewards will be distributed to the 20 best creators with $10 in $ACH each. And another random 50 qualified participants with $4 in $ACH each. One participant could win once.[Notice]1. Make sure you submit your proof via the form. The ownership belongs to the first submitter.Join here: https://forms.gle/BfoMKoF4VqQd2n2g82. Situations that can get extra Bonus:- Impression over 1,000- Comments + RTs/QTs + Likes over 500Proof of Authentication Format:Quote#Proof of AuthenticationForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Discord Username:Twitter Username:Telegram Username:EVM Address:Ramp Demo:  $200 in $ACH1. Participants must subscribe Alchemy Pay YouTube and Medium Channel.2. Generate Ramp Demo on YouTube and share it on Twitter. 3. Go to the ramp page and experience the ramp: https://ramp.alchemypay.org4. Make a Ramp Demo and share it on YouTube and Twitter along with the ramp procedures (Tag @AlchemyPay and hashtag #ACH #AlchemyPayTurkish #Ramp).5. Share the demo to Alchemy Pay Communities.Rewards will be distributed to the 20 best creators with $10 in $ACH each. [Notice]1. Make sure you submit your proof via the form. The ownership belongs to the first submitter.Join here: https://forms.gle/BfoMKoF4VqQd2n2g82. Situations that can get extra Bonus:- Impression over 1,000- Comments + RTs/QTs + Likes over 500Proof of Authentication Format:Quote#Proof of AuthenticationForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Discord Username:Twitter Username:Telegram Username:EVM Address:Community Invitation: $400 in $ACH1. Generate invite link by right clicking the server or Open a ticket to claim a link from admins.2. Invite your friends to join Alchemy Pay Discord and get the role as “ACH member”3. The new inviter must leave 3 messages in the Discord server.4. The new inviter must stay at least 3 weeks in the Discord community.Rewards - First come first serve: The quickest 10 users who invite 20 verified users can get $20 $ACH each- Top Invitee with the most verified users: Top1: $100 in $ACH Top2: $60 in $ACH Top3: $40 in $ACH- One winner can only win one time, get the highest price[Notice]1. Make sure you submit your proof via the form. Join here: https://forms.gle/M9Us6GhcyRJGgGeo9Proof of Authentication Format:Quote#Proof of AuthenticationForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Discord Username:Twitter Username:Telegram Username:EVM Address:Reference:Alchemy Pay Products:A. Crypto On & Off RampsOn and Off-Ramps are a one stop solution to buy & sell crypto via fiat money. The ramp is easily integrated with crypto platforms and dApps, offering users easy purchases from fiat to crypto (on ramp) and back again (off ramp).B. Crypto Card SolutionBusinesses can rapidly set up a crypto card program and provide users with virtual and physical cards. These cards support instant global shopping and can be easily topped up with mainstream tokens.C. NFT CheckoutIt is built for brands, creators, and marketplaces that want to give their users access to NFTs. It’s the very easy solution that enables users to buy NFTs with a credit card like E-commerce.D. Crypto PaymentsAlchemy Pay builds an all-in-one payment system that enables businesses to accept fiat and crypto payments with local fiat settlement.Ramp GatewaySupported payment method in Turkey Visa, Mastercard, Discover, Diners Club, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Bank transfer (Vakif Bank/Ziraat Bank)   Try it: https://ramp.alchemypay.org/Social LinksWebsite: https://alchemypay.orgTwitter: https://twitter.com/alchemypayLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/alchemypayMedium: https://alchemypay.medium.com/YouTube: https://youtube.com/@AlchemyPayAlchemy Pay Branding:
